ComicInfo.Summary:
A continuation of the Backlash series from 1994. This series follows the core cast from Backlash, Backlash, Crimson, and Taboo, along with new recruit for a goverment superhero program titled Wildcore.
The surviving WildCORE members return to department PSI --and planet Earth-- where they recover from the trauma sustained during their trans-dimensional experience. With one member down and another missing, what remains of WildCORE soon discover that they are not the only ones who crossed the Gateway into our world...
Note: The Backlash & Taboo's African Holiday one-shot acts as a follow-up to this series.
